name: Nitaro World Demo
description:
Game

Users will play as Nitaro to fight their safe passage through his land. Nitaro World will offer 4 different universe. Part of first one is show in game demo. Each place will have 8 - 10  levels and few other enemies to fight. Its your choice if you will fight, jump or climb and walk pass enemy. In addition to enemies, various traps will be waiting for you. In game you will have shop where you can buy life for collected coins and diamonds.

It's just a tutorial, but I'd like to hear your opinion

                                           Screen Resolution

Game is build in ratio 16:9 and base / original screen resolution is set 1920 x 1080. But you can choice any 16:9 in configurations before start the game.

                                              Player Control 

Move Left and Right   -   arrow keys or A , D

Climb   -   arrow keys Up , Down or W , S

Jump   -   spacebar

Attack   -   left Ctrl

Buy in shop   -   left Alt

                                                  Feedback

Game is still in development and as solo developer will appreciate your feedback and support or donations which will help a lot.

I would love to hear what you think abut  character control, it is compatible with animations and sounds. Do you think that 3 hearth is fine in game or maybe I should make it 5 because some part is bit too difficult. Would be better to have shop on each level with possibility to buy lost life or maybe each 2-3 stages. Be part of the game creator  and share your thoughts. 

                                           Tutorial / Demo

This tutorial have 3 levels to show player control in game and usage of shop to buy life also you have 1 enemy and few traps on your way to finish it.
